title: lpad
extract: LPAD (left pad) and RPAD (right pad) are SQL functions used to add padding characters to the left or right side of a string up to a given length.Apr 6, 2017
extract_html: LPAD (left pad) and RPAD (right pad) are SQL functions used to add padding characters to the left or right side of a string up to a given length.Apr 6, 2017
